name: Cosmic Vigilance
description:
Currently in Early Development Phase

Cosmic Vigilance is currently an Arcade Spaceship Shooter game with Action  RPG Stylized Abilities.
As a Cosmic Vigilante Pilot you choose to protect the Cosmic Traffic Lanes (CTL) from all dangers.
_____________________________________________

Content in the Demo Version:

  • Arcade Mode
  • 2 Playable Ships
  • 8 Ship Abilities
  • 5 Enemy Ships
  • High Score Tracker
  • Supports Keyboard and Controller.

_____________________________________________

FAQs:

  • Is there a plan for a Kickstarter?
    • Yes, we plan to have a Kickstarter start on Tuesday, May 24, 2022

_____________________________________________

Credits:
